## AdvancedMetadataSelectorComponent.metadataGatherer property

Instance of metadata gatherer, which is used for getting initial metadata

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
get metadataGatherer(): MetadataGatherer<BasicTableMetadata<AdvancedGridColumn>>;

set metadataGatherer(gatherer: MetadataGatherer<BasicTableMetadata<AdvancedGridColumn>>);
```
